title: Biggest Movers: XLM, DOGE Rebound on Saturday, Following Recent Market Sell Off
description: Stellar was a notable mover during Saturday’s session, as the token returned to the green to start the weekend. Prices recently fell lower for six straight days, however, bulls have reentered the market snapping this streak in the process. Dogecoin also rebounded today. Stellar (XLM) Stellar (XLM) rose higher on Saturday, following a recent six-day […]

title: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried seeks permission to work with legal team outside detention center
description: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried requests permission to spend five weekdays outside the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn, New York, to work with his legal team on his defense case.
